triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory uses LLMs as its core technology to perform research tasks autonomously.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: The paper generates machine learning code and evaluates its performance against state-of-the-art methods.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory proposes an autonomous agent-based framework for conducting research.

triples.name: Scientific method
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory automates the scientific research process including literature review, experimentation, and reporting.

triples.name: Code generation
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory generates functional ML code repositories as part of its research output.

triples.name: Literature review
triples.relevance: Literature review is the first stage of Agent Laboratory's three-stage research process.

triples.name: Research
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory proposes an autonomous approach to accelerate and reduce costs in the research process.

triples.name: Autonomous agent
triples.relevance: Agent Laboratory operates as an autonomous LLM-based agent that performs research tasks without human intervention.
